00018 abstract class TagBlock extends PrayBlock {

00030     public function TagBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags,$type) {
00031         parent::PrayBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags,$type);
00032         if($prayfile instanceof PRAYFile) {
00033         } else if(is_array($prayfile)) {
00034             $this->tags = $prayfile;
00035         }

00040 
00044     public function GetTag($key) {
00045         $this->EnsureDecompiled();
00046         foreach($this->tags as $tk => $tv) {
00047             if($key == $tk) {
00048                 return $tv;
00049             }
00050         }
00051     }
00053 
00057     public function GetTags() {
00058         $this->EnsureDecompiled();
00059         return $this->tags;
00060     }

00069     protected function CompileBlockData() {
00070         $compiled = '';
00071         $ints = array();
00072         $strings = array();
00073         foreach($this->tags as $key=>$value) {
00074             if(is_int($value)) {
00075                 $ints[$key] = $value;
00076             } else {
00077                 $strings[$key] = $value;
00078             }
00079         }
00080         $compiled .= pack('V',sizeof($ints));
00081         foreach($ints as $key=>$value) {
00082             $compiled .= pack('V',strlen($key));
00083             $compiled .= $key;
00084             $compiled .= pack('V',$value);
00085         }
00086         $compiled .= pack('V',sizeof($strings));
00087         foreach($strings as $key=>$value) {
00088             $compiled .= pack('V',strlen($key));
00089             $compiled .= $key;
00090             $compiled .= pack('V',strlen($value));
00091             $compiled .= $value;
00092         }
00093         return $compiled;
00094     }
00095 
00097 
00100     protected function DecompileBlockData() {
00101     //use GetData because it decompresses if necessary.
00102         $blockReader = new StringReader($this->GetData());
00103         
00104         $numInts = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00105         for($i=0;$i<$numInts;$i++) {
00106             $nameLength = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00107             $name = $blockReader->Read($nameLength);
00108             $int = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00109             $this->tags[$name] = $int;
00110         }
00111         
00112         
00113         $numStrings = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00114         for($i=0;$i<$numStrings;$i++) {
00115             $nameLength = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00116             $name = $blockReader->Read($nameLength);
00117             $stringLength = $blockReader->ReadInt(4);
00118             $string = $blockReader->Read($stringLength);
00119             $this->tags[$name] = $string;
00120         }
00121     }
00123 }
